mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENTS (PAYCODE, IMP_UID, PG, PAY_METHOD, PAY_STATE, PRICE, PAY_DATE, CANCELYN, CANCEL_DATE, CANCEL_DESC, PRODUCT_CODE, USERID, DELFLAG, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (PAYMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{imp_uid}, #{pg}, #{pay_method}, 'paid', #{price}, SYSDATE, 'N', NULL, NULL, #{product_code}, #{userid}, 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT PAYCODE, IMP_UID, PG, PAY_METHOD, PAY_STATE, PRICE, PAY_DATE, CANCELYN, CANCEL_DATE, CANCEL_DESC, PRODUCT_CODE, USERID, DELFLAG, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE FROM PAYMENTS

SELECT PAYCODE, IMP_UID, PG, PAY_METHOD, PAY_STATE, PRICE, PAY_DATE, CANCELYN, CANCEL_DATE, CANCEL_DESC, PRODUCT_CODE, USERID, DELFLAG, UPDATE_DATE FROM PAYMENTS WHERE USERID LIKE '%' || #{userid} || '%'
SELECT PAYCODE, IMP_UID, PG, PAY_METHOD, PAY_STATE, PRICE, PAY_DATE, CANCELYN, CANCEL_DATE, CANCEL_DESC, PRODUCT_CODE, USERID, DELFLAG FROM PAYMENTS WHERE USERID = #{userid}
SELECT PAYCODE, IMP_UID, PG, PAY_METHOD, PAY_STATE, PRICE, PAY_DATE, CANCELYN, CANCEL_DATE, CANCEL_DESC, PRODUCT_CODE, USERID, DELFLAG, UPDATE_DATE FROM PAYMENTS WHERE PAYCODE = #{paycode}
